mapper.select: select user_id, username, nickname, email, phone, gender, birthday, city_id, avatar, remarks, create_time, create_by from sys_user where is_deleted = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user(user_id, username, password, nickname, email, phone, gender, birthday, city_id, avatar, remarks, is_deleted, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{userNick}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userGender}, #{userBirthday}, #{userCity}, #{userAvatar}, #{userMarks}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update sys_user set username=#{userName}, nickname=#{userNick}, email=#{userEmail}, phone=#{userPhone}, gender=#{userGender}, birthday=#{userBirthday}, city_id=#{userCity}, avatar=#{userAvatar}, remarks=#{userMarks}, update_time=#{updateTime} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select username as userName, nickname as userNick, email as userEmail, phone as userPhone, gender as userGender, birthday as userBirthday, city_id as userCity, avatar as userAvatar, remarks as userMarks, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime from sys_user where user_id = #{userId}
